availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Littleton F. Cash (Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County and Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Caldwell County, Kentucky, native. Married to Edney Celina Harris Cash in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on June 14, 1845. Father of William H. Cash. Married to Nancy A. Gore Cash. Father of Adela Cash, James M. Cash, George M. Cash, Joseph M. Cash, Thomas Littleton Cash, and Bedford Cash. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 323A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 663.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #10776.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, 1786-1878, Film #000851644, p. 258.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Caldwell County Administration Bonds, vol 19-20, 1830-1869.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Caldwell County Administration Bonds, 1830-1869; vol. F, 1838-1845.
"Littleton Fowler Cash (1824-1897)," Find A Grave, Memorial #58276840, accessed February 24, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/58276840.
